subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: The defending champion, Tom Watson, shot an eight-under 63 to take a three-stroke lead over Mark Wiebe and David Eger after the first round of the Outback Steakhouse Pro-Am in Lutz, Fla. Watson, 58, shot a seven-under 28 on his last nine holes, the front nine of the T.P.C. Tampa Bay, missing two birdie putts — a 12-footer on No. 2 and a 20-footer on No. 8.
